data.title: César Flores Rodríguez appointed as Chief Division Officer (CDO) for Nemetschek Group’s Operate & Manage and Digital Twin business
data.meta_description: (PRESS RELEASE) MUNICH, 1-Sep-2022 — /EuropaWire/ — Nemetschek SE (ETR: NEM), a leading software solutions provider for the architects, engineers, constru
data.text:
(PRESS RELEASE) MUNICH, 1-Sep-2022 — /EuropaWire/ — Nemetschek SE (ETR: NEM), a leading software solutions provider for the architects, engineers, construction and the media markets, has announced the appointment of César Flores Rodríguez as Chief Division Officer (CDO) for Operate & Manage and Digital Twin business of the company with an immediate effect.

In his role he will be leading and building up Nemetschek Group‘s new Digital Twin business, driving the development of its solutions and services, and being a thought leader for this topic. Additionally, he has the full responsibility for Nemetschek Group’s Operate & Manage Division with a special focus on Go-to-Market, accelerating growth and cross-selling.

“César is a highly respected technology leader with vast experience driving operational excellence across global, high-growth companies,” says Yves Padrines, CEO of the Nemetschek Group. “With his background and experience, he brings immense value to both the success of our Operate & Manage Division and driving our Digital Twin business. We are delighted to welcome him to the Nemetschek Group”, Yves continues.

“I’m thrilled to be joining the Nemetschek Group and working with the mission-driven team that has already provided such a great foundation to build upon. A key part of my role will be to leverage the great market potential in Operate & Manage. At the same time, I want to further expand our Digital Twin competence and shape this business globally,” emphasizes César Flores Rodríguez.

César has more than 23 years of experience in the cloud space, especially in solutions for the AEC/O industry. Before joining the Nemetschek Group, he was Managing Director of Radius Telecoms Europe and CSO of NFON AG. During his stay at NFON the company went public and became the leading Cloud PBX provider in Europe.

Prior to that, he was co-founder and managing director of conject Holding GmbH, the then leading Common Data Environment (CDE) for the construction industry in Europe, which he successfully sold in a trade sale to Aconex (now part of Oracle), where he became COO EMEA. His early career was formed in strategy consulting at Mercer Management Consulting (now Oliver Wyman). He holds a German Spanish double diploma in business administration from Universidad Pontificia Comillas (Madrid) ICADE and ESB Reutlingen.

For further information on the Nemetschek Group, please contact:

Nemetschek Group
